code: import axios from'axios';export var downloadFuc=function downloadFuc(linkURL,name){axios.get(linkURL,{responseType:'arraybuffer',headers:{'Content-Type':'audio/mpeg'}}).then(function(response){var url=window.URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([response.data]));var link=document.createElement('a');link.href=url;link.setAttribute('download',"".concat(name,".mp3"));document.body.appendChild(link);link.click();}).catch(function(error){return alert(error);});};
